welcome:
Welcome to the N-of-1 therapeutic test design tool!
Please login or register to start using the tool.
pwd-instructions:
Password requirements:
- between 8 and 32 characters
- minimum 1 upper and 1 lower case letter
- minimum 1 digit or special character
 - no spaces, tabs or line breaks

forgot-pwd.dialog-content: Enter the email address associated with your account. A link to reset your password will be sent to you.

reset-pwd.link-expired: The password reset link has expired
reset-pwd.link-expired-desc: For security reasons, the link to reset your password is only valid for 20 minutes. Would you like to receive the link again ?
reset-pwd.title: Choose a new password
reset-pwd.subject: Reset password
reset-pwd.intro-2: The password reset link will expire if not used within the next 20 minutes.
reset-pwd.link-info: To reset your password, please follow the link below:
reset-pwd.ignore: If you have not requested a password reset, please ignore this email and your password will not be changed.

alert.reset-success: The password has been successfully reset
alert.link-sent: The link has been successfully sent
